page.title: 04The Village Hall.
page.content:
The Village Hall is by the recreation field.Â£14,500 has recently been raised to enlarge the building. There is a main hall with stage, kitchen, showers for use after football matches and smaller rooms used for committee meetings and clinic.
The village hall is the centre of village life and is used for dances, parties, bingo, jumble sales, talent competitions, shows and play group.
The clubs held there include Brownies Guides and Cubs, table tennis, British Legion and over 60's.
The school also uses the village hall for lunches and Sponsored Obstacle races.
